display_name: OSA-18 Quality of Life: Summary score (sum)
description:
Summary score for the Obstructive Sleep Apnea-18 Quality of Life Questionnaire.Total OSA-18 survey scores are categorized into three groups based on the impact on the quality of life: minor (scores below 60), moderate (scores between 60 and 80) and major (scores above 80). [Franco RA et al., 2000 (PubMed ID: 10889473)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10889473/)

[Search for all OSA-18 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/chat/variables?search=osa18)
